title: 820-01700 charging issues
message:
Board is clean, had a short on CBB408 and CD3217 was also damaged, board alone always gets only 5v, when battery is connected I get 20v on meter but battery wont charge, while the battery still had some charge I was able to see its percentage inside MacOS.

Reviving T2 did nothing

I don't have another battery, what can I test to see if the charging circuit is working?

title: 820-01700 charging issues
message: Tested with 96w charger and new battery as well as original battery, same exact problem.

title: 820-01700 charging issues
message: You must get 20V on USB-C ports without battery first.
